dialog.text: Hey Bobby, what the fuck are you doing walking around like a sketchy son of a bitch this time of night without a drink?
Hah! You motherfucker, I didn't even know it was you, I was just guessing! Why don't you come over here and have a beer?
You son of a bitch. I'm looking for a drink!
Hah! You motherfucker, I didn't even know it was you, I was just guessing! Then why don't you come over here and have a beer?
Man, you're wasted. What's the shovel for?

Digging and dancing. I'm going to make a fire, and then, my lady and I are gonna drink and jump around the flames to the fine sound of some loud music playing. Like crazy ass motherfuckers we will dance. God, Bobby, I love the summer.
